entry.title: Azzaro Wanted Tonic Cologne
entry.summary:
Vendor: Azzaro
Type: Eau De Toiette Spray
Price: 61.44

Azzaro Wanted Tonic Cologne by Azzaro, Released in 2020, azzaro wanted tonic puts a casual yet stylish spin on men's fragrances. This scent is from french designer azzaro, and it demonstrates a fresh approach to simple elegance. 
The top notes of lime and cardamom are tart and spicy, while the heart notes of ginger and aquatic accords take on a delicate feel. Finally, the base notes of patchouli and benzoin ground the scent and give it depth and complexity for a fragrance that makes a statement

entry.title: Al Haramain Amber Oud
entry.summary:
Vendor: Al Haramain
Type: Eau De Parfium Spray
Price: 68.44

Al Haramain Amber Oud Tobacco Edition Cologne by Al Haramain, Amber oud tobacco edition for men is a strong, spicy fragrance from the perfume house of al haramain. It opens with top notes of black pepper, ginger, cinnamon, and tobacco leaf. 
The heart continues this spice theme with middle notes of cloves, star anise, vanilla, cacao, incense, and tonka bean. The dry down is surprisingly sweet with base notes of dried fruits, woodsy notes, and tobacco. This scent has enormous sillage and
 
longevity, so a little goes a long way

entry.title: Ferragamo Cologne New 2021
entry.summary:
Vendor: Salvatore Ferragamo
Type: Eau De Toiette Spray
Price: 64.88

Ferragamo Cologne by Salvatore Ferragamo, Launched by salvatore ferragamo in 2020, ferragamo is an aromatic fragrance for men. Citrusy top notes of lemon and bergamot are complemented by sage in the opening layer of the fragrance. 
These bright notes make way for dark earthiness in the heart layer where cedar and leather combine with violet leaf. Warm base notes of musk, oakmoss and vetiver provide the finishing touches. The fragrance was designed by perfumer antoine maisondieu and wears well throughout the year

entry.title: Straight to Heaven Extreme
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kilian
Type: Eau De Pafum Spray
Price: 29.88 - 58.44 (2 variants)

Description

Get an overdose of vanilla and rum in Straight to Heaven, white cristal - EXTREME. Addictive personalities, beware. Like any liquor taken straight, it hits fast, hard and leaves you wanting more. Skipping purgatory altogether, it heads straight to heaven as notes of Martinique rum hit climax in high dose. 

Straight to Heaven Extreme Notes

The scent of burning rum gently rounds off into a smouldering sensuality of nutmeg essence. A woody amber trail remains, grounded by dark patchouli and dry cedar wood essence. Inciting the passions comes a lift of vanilla absolute from Madagascar.

entry.title: Tobacco Oud Decant by Tom Ford
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tom Ford
Type: Eau De Parfum Spray (Unisex)
Price: 16.88 - 51.99 (3 variants)

Tobacco Oud is part of the new " Oud Collection" . And in case you were wondering, any resemblance to Vanilla Tobacco , a favorite of private blend is certainly not a coincidence , since Tobacco Oud was composed by the same perfumer Oliver Gillotin.
Here, vanilla is obviously ousted by the oud . The agreement tobacco is less of a sweet pipe tobacco if it retains the inflexion delicious almond tonka . Instead , he was inspired by " dokha " a mixture of herbs, flowers and spices in charge of traditional tobacco . And a heady mix that is corresponding to the fragrant fumes oud resin and aromatic tobacco , with no side effects ...
If you want a darker version of the wooded Vanilla Tobacco , or as to tame your oud with a touch of sweetness : it is one of the most addictive offerings Mr. Ford to this day.

Tobacco Oud Notes

Oud, tobacco absolute dust, coriander, cistus labdanum, cedar, patchouli, sandalwood, tonka bean roasted organic, castoreum.

entry.title: Straight to Heaven by Kilian Decant
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kilian
Type: Eau de parfum
Price: 12.88 - 49.88 (3 variants)

Rum soaked and boozy fabulous, Straight To Heaven is pure decadence. The heat of the Caribbean islands is melded with a sexy, deep patchouli and spiced up with dried fruits and nutmeg. It's mysterious and tempting, giving off an aura of wildness without being nose-searing raw or musk-soaked animalistic. Brazilian rosewood and cedar rein in this fragrance's wild side, while vanilla absolute and white musk impart a soft, not to be trusted sweetness. Very wearable no matter what the occasion…but not quite tame.

Straight to Heaven Notes

Martinican rum absolute, dried fruits accord, Javanese nutmeg oil, hedione, cedarwood, Indonesian patchouli oil, ambergris, vanilla absolute, white musk.

entry.title: Bergamote 22 By LE Labo Decant
entry.summary:
Vendor: Le labo
Type: Eau De Parfuim Spray (Unisex)
Price: 18.44 - 51.44 (3 variants)

Bergamote 22 started its life under the code name “Fire Cologne”, and as soon as we smelled the unexpected effervescent spiciness of its top notes, we knew why. Subtle but noticeable, the piquancy of nutmeg puts a twist on the classic citrus scent genre. The tingling spice compliments beautifully the fizzy notes of grapefruit and bergamot. The translucent green aspect brought on by petit grain is yet another layer that unfolds on the skin revealing the complex nature of this seemingly simple composition. The gauzy citrus notes are grounded by amber, musk and vetiver. The substantionality of the base notes gives Bergamote 22 weight and rich texture seldom found in citrus blends. A unisex fragrance with an unforgettable personality.

Bergamote 22 Notes

Bergamot, petitgrain, grapefruit, nutmeg, orange blossom, aspic, cedar, amber, musk and vetiver.

he original bottle on the main picture is not for sale, it just shows the original bottle from which perfume will be decanted. Therefore, the customer will receive the authentic fragrance poured from the original bottle into a new sterile vial. The size of the vial is your choice.

entry.title: Fucking Fabulous Decants
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tom Ford
Type: Eau De Parfuim Spray (Unisex)
Price: 19.88 - 45.88 (2 variants)

Vulgar, shocking, rude, funny, tongue in cheek….no matter what you think of the name, there’s no denying that it’s got people talking. But in the kerfuffle over the name, has the fragrance itself been a bit overlooked? We think it might have been. The truth is that Tom Ford Fucking Fabulous is very good. It’s an edible but fresh suede scent that borrows a bunch of bitter herbs from old school fougeres, scads of buttery tonka from the gourmand category, and wraps it all up in a musky cashmeran glow. And guess what? Totally works.

Clary sage and lavender top out the scent, their clean, smoky greenness meshing seamlessly with plush orris butter to form a leather note that’s both soft and aromatic. Lashings of bittersweet almond and tonka bean beneath give the scent a velvety, almost oily-resinous sweetness, like white chocolate melted down with coffee grounds. The fragrance moves between bitter and sweet, herbal and creamy, powdery and oily over the course of the wear, keeping the journey totally interesting for us. Rumor has it that Tom Ford took one whiff of this creation and exclaimed, “This is fucking fabulous!” We’re inclined to agree. Set your feelings aside for the name, take it out for a ride, and you may agree as well.

Fabulous Notes

Lavender, clary sage, bitter almond, tonka bean, orris root, leather, cashmeran, amber, white woods.

The original bottle on the main picture is not for sale, it just shows the original bottle from which perfume will be decanted. Therefore, the customer will receive the authentic fragrance poured from original bottle into a new sterile vial. The size of the vial is your choice.

entry.title: Viking By Creed Decant
entry.summary:
Vendor: Creed
Type: Eau De Parfium Spray
Price: 12.99 - 49.99 (3 variants)

Viking, a fiery men’s fragrance that bottles the fearless spirit of boundless exploration for the modern man who goes against the grain. Inspired by the incredibly crafted longships, a centerpiece of the Viking Age and one of the greatest design feats of the ninth century. A symbol of voyage and undeniable perseverance, longships were carefully designed for the skilled seaman who embodied unbridled determination to conquer. Viking marks the brand’s first major men’s scent since the introduction of the cult best-selling Aventus in 2010. Viking was launched in 2017. The nose behind this fragrance is Oliver Creed.

Viking Notes

Top notes are Calabrian bergamot, Sicilian lemon, la réunion baie rose (pink peppercorn). Middle note are peppercorn, Bulgarian rose, peppermint. Base note are Indian sandalwood, Haitian vetiver, Indian patchouli, lavender absolute.

This item is a hand-decanted sample. The original bottle on the main picture is not for sale, it just shows the original bottle from which perfume will be decanted. Therefore, the customer will receive the authentic fragrance poured from original bottle into a new sterile vial. The size of the vial is your choice.

entry.title: Aventus by Creed Decants
entry.summary:
Vendor: Aventus
Type: Eau De Pafum Spray
Price: 13.99 - 49.99 (3 variants)

The most popular fragrance ever created in the history of the House of Creed, Aventus is a fragrance for men - also adored by women - celebrating strength, power, vision, and success. Introduced in 2010, Creed's Aventus is inspired by the dramatic life of a historic emperor who waged war, peace, and romance on his terms, riding on horseback to victory. The unrivaled Aventus is comprised of superb ingredients, a worldly blend and must-have for the individual who savors a life well-lived. 
Royal but not imposing, Creed Aventus is made with ingredients hand-selected worldwide by Olivier Creed, along with his son, Erwin, the seventh generation of Creed and its future chief. Essences he chose were shipped to Creed's French workshop, where father and son created Aventus using hand production methods that date to the founding of the House of Creed in 1760. The result: a work of excellence fit for the most discerning clientele. 
The Aventus bottle is designed with a sleek black leather band wrapped around the classic Creed "flask". The silver emblem of horse and rider evokes unbounded adventure and spirit. Aventus was launched in 2010. Aventus was created by Olivier Creed Sixth Generation and Erwin CreedSeventh Generation.

he original bottle on the main picture is not for sale, it just shows the original bottle from which perfume will be decanted. Therefore, the customer will receive the authentic fragrance poured from the original bottle into a new sterile vial. The size of the vial is your choice.

entry.title: Baccarat Rouge 540
entry.summary:
Vendor: Maison Francis Kurkdjian
Type: Eau De Parfium Spray
Price: 21.44 - 59.88 (6 variants)

n the Fall of 2014, Baccarat, the most prestigious and opulent crystalworks in the world, celebrated the 250th anniversary of their founding by releasing an extraordinary crystal decanter containing a luminous, exclusive fragrance created by Francis Kurkdjian. Only 250 of these bottles were produced, for a price of $4000 apiece. Now, for the first time ever, this spectacular fragrance is available to the world as Baccarat Rouge 540, a gorgeously woody floral-amber equal parts transparent, dense, and intense. 

MFK describes Rouge 540 not in terms of top, heart and base notes, but rather as the interplay between three unique accords, each lending a distinct and visceral characteristic. The "breeze" accord, jasmine and saffron, sits sheer and delicately spiced on the skin, leading way for the cedar-driven blend of woods that make up the robust and crackling "heat" accord. Finally, a "mineral" accord of ambergris seems simultaneously warm and cool, delivering deceptively straightforward depth to mimic the sophistication of Baccarat Crystal itself. A fragrance that was only meant to belong to 250 of the world's wealthiest collectors is now available, and we could not be more thrilled to offer it.

Baccarat Rouge 540  Notes

Citrus, jasmine, saffron, sage, ambergris, oakmoss, cedar.

The original bottle on the main picture is not for sale, it just shows the original bottle from which perfume will be decanted. Therefore, the customer will receive the authentic fragrance poured from original bottle into a new sterile vial. The size of the vial is your choice.

entry.title: Men's Rogaine 5% Minoxidil Foam for Hair Regrowth
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rogaine
Type: Eau De Toilette
Price: 58.44

Help treat hair loss and regrow fuller hair with Men's Rogaine 5% Minoxidil Topical Foam. Ideal for use at the early stages of hair thinning, this fast-working hair regrowth treatment is clinically proven to regrow more hair in 12 weeks. Unlike hair loss shampoos and hair thickening products that temporarily plump hair from the outside, Rogaine penetrates the scalp to reactivate shrunken hair follicles, allowing for regrowth of hair. The 5% Minoxidil formula works to boost hair follicle activity and hair protein production, while Tricho-Prime Technology uses a proprietary combination of ingredients to create an optimal environment for hair regrowth. This men's hair re- growth treatment also contains botanical extracts and emollient to help maintain a healthy, conditioned scalp, plus alphahydroxy acid (AHA) to promote natural skin exfoliation to help keep follicles open. It comes in a no-mess foam that is easy to use and is designed to fit easily into your routine.
  • 3-month supply of Men's Rogaine 5% Minoxidil Foam treatment for hair regrowth
  • Ideal for use at the early stages of hair thinning and allows for the regrowth of fuller hair
  • The 5% Minoxidil formula works to boost hair follicle activity and hair protein production
  • Tricho-Prime Technology works on contact to create a healthy hair regrowth environment
  • From the #1 dermatologist-recommended brand, this anti-hair loss foam also conditions the scalp
  • Men's hair growth treatment comes in an easy-to-apply foam designed to fit into your daily routine

John Varvatos Artisan Pure Cologne by John Varvatos, John varvtos artisan pure is a highly masculine cologne that came out as a limited edition. It was released in 2017, but it draws influence from an earlier fragrance from john varvatos that came out in 2009.
